subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Muhammad Wilkerson, the defensive lineman who was the Jets’ first-round draft choice Thursday, added weight and toughness at Temple, impressing the Jets during a recent workout.
snippet: Muhammad Wilkerson, the defensive lineman who was the Jets’ first-round draft choice Thursday, added weight and toughness at Temple, impressing the Jets during a recent workout.
